SEARCH

Package game.dice

package game.dice
This defines different types of dice objects, with sides, colors, and different randomness.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    game
    Contains game-related classes for different types of dice games.
    game.enums
    A group of enums for our dice game.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ColorDice
    This abstract class represents a colored dice, which extends the functionality of a standard dice.
    Dice
    This represents dice objects with sides of 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 20.
    FairDice
    This class represents a fair dice, inheriting from the ColorDice class.
    FixedDice
    This class represents a fixed dice, inheriting from the ColorDice class.
    WeightedDice
    This class represents a weighted dice, inheriting from the ColorDice class.
